attributes.action: Recognise that Cornwall is the fourth nation of Great Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Cornish have long maintained that they are a nation seperate from Scotland, Wales and England.  They have their own language, and once had their own currency, and in the past the Cornish Stannary Parliament could veto Westminster.  A large percentage have preveously petitioned for a Cornish National Assembly.  They once produced 1/4 of the worlds tin to fuel the industrial revolution, and still produce 1/4 of the china clay.
